typeSystemDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.bio.model.PubMedSourceDocumentInformation
typeSystemDescription.description: Defines a type for storing information about the original source document from which the current CAS was initialized Includes URI for local filename, Size

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.bio.BioSourceDocumentInformation
typeDescription.description: Stores detailed information about the original source document for the bio medical domain.

featureDescription.name: uri
featureDescription.description: URI of document. (For example, file:///MyDirectory/myFile.txt for a simple file or http://incubator.apache.org/uima/index.html for content from a web source.)

featureDescription.name: documentSize
featureDescription.description: Size of original document in bytes before processing by CAS Initializer. Either absolute file size of size within file or other source.

featureDescription.name: PMCID
featureDescription.description: a unique reference number or identifier that is assigned to every article that is accepted into PMC

featureDescription.name: PMID
featureDescription.description: a unique reference number for PubMed citations

featureDescription.name: publishDate
featureDescription.description: The date when this document was published.

featureDescription.name: Docno
featureDescription.description: Unique doc identifier for Indri & SEPIA to use. May differ for different corpora
